metadata.title: CVE-2021-3537 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A vulnerability found in libxml2 in versions before 2.9.11 shows that it did not propagate errors while parsing XML mixed content, causing a NULL dereference. If an untrusted XML document was parsed in recovery mode and post-validated, the flaw could be used to crash the application. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.9.10+dfsg-6.3ubuntu0.1').
